title: Property Development Opportunity Analysis
text:
Welcome
This comprehensive analysis identifies and evaluates development opportunities across the property portfolio, focusing on underutilized assets with significant potential.

title: Property Development Opportunity Analysis
text:
0.1 Report Purpose
This analysis provides:

Strategic Insights: Identification of high-potential development opportunities
Data-Driven Decisions: Evidence-based property assessments
Financial Planning: Resource allocation guidance
Geographic Analysis: Regional distribution and market potential

title: Property Development Opportunity Analysis
text:
0.2 Key Highlights






Top Finding



Significant underutilized assets identified with strong development potential across multiple geographic regions.

title: Property Development Opportunity Analysis
text:
0.3 How to Use This Report

Executive Summary: Quick overview and key findings
Methodology: Understanding our analytical approach
Analysis Results: Detailed findings and insights
Summary Statistics: Portfolio-wide metrics
Property Profiles: Individual property assessments
Appendices: Technical details and references







Interactive Features



This report includes interactive visualizations and tools. Use the filters and controls to explore the data dynamically.

title: Property Development Opportunity Analysis
text:
0.4 Navigation
Use the table of contents on the left to navigate between sections, or use the search function to find specific topics.

title: Executive Summary
text:
At a Glance: Top 10 Properties
This analysis examines properties in the Episcopal Diosese of Virginia with fewer than 30 Sunday attendees, focusing on development potential through five key metrics: land value, zoning/density, acreage, environmental limitations, and Qualified Census Tract (QCT) status. This report was done for VEREP (Virginia Episcopal Real Estate Partners) in conjunction with case study projects HDAdvisors is facilitating.

title: Executive Summary
text:
#| '!! shinylive warning !!': |
#|   shinylive does not work in self-contained HTML documents.
#|   Please set `embed-resources: false` in your metadata.
#| standalone: true
#| viewerHeight: 500
#| label: fig-top-properties
#| fig-cap: "Interactive Top 10 Properties Dashboard"
#| include: false

# Sample data - replace with your actual data
top_properties <- data.frame(
  Property = paste("Property", 1:10),
  Score = c(95, 92, 88, 85, 82, 78, 75, 72, 68, 65),
  Location = rep(c("North", "South", "East", "West"), length.out = 10),
  Size_Acres = round(runif(10, 1, 50), 1),
  Development_Potential = c("High", "High", "High", "Medium", "Medium", 
                           "Medium", "Medium", "Low", "Low", "Low")
)

ui <- page_sidebar(
  title = "Top 10 Development Opportunities",
  sidebar = sidebar(
    selectInput("region", "Filter by Region:",
                choices = c("All", unique(top_properties$Location))),
    sliderInput("min_score", "Minimum Score:",
                min = 0, max = 100, value = 60)
  ),
  card(
    card_header("Property Rankings"),
    DTOutput("property_table")
  )
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  filtered_data <- reactive({
    data <- top_properties
    
    if (input$region != "All") {
      data <- data[data$Location == input$region, ]
    }
    
    data <- data[data$Score >= input$min_score, ]
    data
  })
  
  output$property_table <- renderDT({
    datatable(filtered_data(), 
              options = list(pageLength = 10, dom = 't'),
              rownames = FALSE)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)

title: Executive Summary
text:
Key Findings

Significant Underutilized Assets
Our analysis identified XX properties with substantial development potential, representing approximately $XX million in potential value creation.
Parking lots (highest development scores): Structured parking with mixed-use above - Open space parcels: Well-located vacant land ideal for ground lease arrangements - Properties with declining congregations: Sites where development can provide financial stability


Geographic Distribution

Northern Region: XX properties (XX% of portfolio)
Southern Region: XX properties (XX% of portfolio)
Eastern Region: XX properties (XX% of portfolio)
Western Region: XX properties (XX% of portfolio)

Development opportunities are distributed across Virginia, with concentrations in:

Urban/suburban areas with strong walkability scores
Markets with favorable demographics and LIHTC eligibility
Transit-accessible locations supporting reduced parking requirements



Financial Sustainability Imperative






Critical Finding



Development of identified properties is essential for long-term financial sustainability and mission fulfillment.

title: Executive Summary
text:
Next Steps

Priority Assessment: Review top-ranked properties for immediate action
Feasibility Studies: Conduct detailed feasibility analysis for top candidates
Stakeholder Engagement: Engage relevant stakeholders for high-priority sites
Financial Planning: Develop funding strategies and timelines

title: 7  Geographic Distribution
text:
Code
pal <- colorNumeric(
  palette = "YlOrRd",
  domain = top_10$development_score
)

leaflet(top_10) |>
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron) |>
  addCircleMarkers(
    lng = ~lon,
    lat = ~lat,
    radius = ~sqrt(area_acres) * 5,
    fillColor = ~pal(development_score),
    fillOpacity = 0.8,
    color = "white",
    weight = 2,
    popup = ~paste0(
      "<div style='font-family: Lato, sans-serif; min-width: 250px;'>",
      "<h4 style='color: #445ca9; margin-bottom: 10px;'>Rank #", rank, "</h4>",
      "<p style='margin: 5px 0;'><b>", site_address, "</b><br>",
      site_city, ", ", site_county, " County</p>",
      "<hr style='margin: 10px 0;'>",
      "<p style='margin: 5px 0;'><b>Development Score:</b> ", round(development_score, 1), "/100<br>",
      "<b>Size:</b> ", round(area_acres, 2), " acres<br>",
      "<b>Tier:</b> ", development_tier, "</p>",
      if_else(!is.na(name), 
              paste0("<hr style='margin: 10px 0;'><p style='margin: 5px 0;'><b>Congregation:</b> ", name, "</p>"), 
              ""),
      "</div>"
    ),
    label = ~paste0("#", rank, ": ", site_address)
  ) |>
  addLegend(
    position = "bottomright",
    pal = pal,
    values = ~development_score,
    title = "Development<br>Score",
    opacity = 1
  ) |>
  setView(lng = mean(top_10$lon, na.rm = TRUE), lat = mean(top_10$lat, na.rm = TRUE), zoom = 7)

title: 9  Geographic Distribution
text:
9.0.1 Parcels by Diocesan Region


Code
regional_stats |>
  kable(
    col.names = c("# Parcels", "Total Acres", "% of Total Acreage", "Avg Dev Score"),
    digits = c(0, 0, 1, 1, 1)
  ) |>
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover")) |>
  row_spec(0, bold = TRUE, background = "#8baeaa", color = "white")
